cosmos.question: I'm big and yellow and give the Earth light. What am I?

hints.text: ☀️ You see me during the day
🔥 I'm very hot
🌻 Plants need me to grow

cosmos.question: I'm round and you can sometimes see me at night. Sometimes I'm full, sometimes just a sliver. What am I?

hints.text: 🌚 Wolves howl at me!
🧀 People say I'm made of cheese, but I'm not!
🌑 I go around the Earth

cosmos.question: I'm a bright light in the night sky that twinkles. What am I?

hints.text: ✨ I am very far away
⭐ I am made of hot gas
🌠 You can wish upon me

cosmos.question: I am a big ball of rock or gas that goes around the Sun. What am I called?

hints.text: 🌎 You live on one!
🪐 There are many of us in space
🔴 Mars is an example

cosmos.question: I am the planet where you live. What's my name?

hints.text: 💧I have lots of water
🌱 I have plants and trees
🏠 People live here

cosmos.question: I'm red and rusty, and people sometimes wonder if there's life on me. Which planet am I?

hints.text: 🍫 I'm the color of chocolate
🚀 People send robots to explore me
🔥 I'm named after a Roman god of war

cosmos.question: I am a group of stars that make a picture in the sky. What am I?

hints.text: 🐻 Ursa Major is one!
🌌 Some people use them to navigate
💡 You need dark skies to see them well

cosmos.question: I am a star with planets that go around me. What is this called?

hints.text: ☀️ Earth is part of one of these!
🪐 It has planets, moons, and asteroids.
👨‍🚀 It's a group that exists in space

cosmos.question: I'm a very large group of stars, gas, and dust held together by gravity. What am I?

hints.text: ✨ The Milky Way is one!
🌀 I have a spiral shape sometimes
🌌 I am very big and have many stars

cosmos.question: I am a giant planet with beautiful rings around me. Which planet am I?

hints.text: 💍 My rings are made of ice and rock
🪐 I'm a gas giant
💨 I am the sixth planet from the Sun

bug.question: I have six legs and I like to crawl. I make honey. Who am I?

hints.text: 🌻 I fly from flower to flower
🍯 Bears love to eat what I make
🐝 I buzz!

bug.question: I am a tiny insect that marches in a line. I can carry things much bigger than me. Who am I?

hints.text: 🧺 I work with all my friends
🥪 I love crumbs!
🐜 I am very small

bug.question: I have beautiful wings and fly around in gardens. I used to be a caterpillar. What am I?

hints.text: 🌸 I like flowers
🌈 My wings have pretty colors
🦋 I start as a little worm

bug.question: I hop around and I am green. I make a 'CHIRP' sound. What am I?

hints.text: 🌱 I like to eat plants
🦵 I have long legs for jumping
🔊 I make a loud noise in the summer

bug.question: I have a red shell with black spots. I am considered good luck. What am I?

hints.text: 🐞 People like to see me in their garden
🔴 I am usually red
⚫ I have dots

bug.question: I spin a web to catch my dinner. I have eight legs. What am I?

hints.text: 🕸️ I like to live in corners
🕷️ Some people are scared of me
🪰 Flies are my favorite food

bug.question: I come out at night and bite you. I leave an itchy bump. Who am I?

hints.text: 🌙 I like the dark
🩸 I drink blood
🦟 I buzz in your ear

bug.question: I make a cozy home of silk on a tree. Inside me a butterfly grows. What am I?

hints.text: 🌳 I am found on branches
🐛 A caterpillar lives here before flying away
🏡 A butterfly is born in me

bug.question: I am long and skinny, and I wiggle in the ground. Birds like to eat me! What am I?

hints.text: 🪱 I help plants grow
🐦 A robin's favorite snack
흙 I live in the dirt

bug.question: I glow in the dark with my light. You can see me during summer nights. What am I?

hints.text: ✨ I light up in the dark
🌃 I come out when it's nighttime
🔦 I am an insect that glows
